channel.title: The Last Era~ 317, CUSTOM BOSSES, PRAYER 500000000000 CUSTOMSSS
channel.description:
hai this is my gay source release
THERES NO CUSTOMS YOU FAGS!!
IF THE CLIENT DOESN'T WORK USE ICLARITY CLIENT OR USE AMBITIONZ CLIENT!!!!!!!!!!!!
~Note~: This isn't Delta, It's Devolution.
This is a Server, with bosses, skilling, never used areas, etc.
Trying to make a 'Unique Server'
This is a 317 client loading 377 cache, that's the client.
Base: Final Devolution 2.7
REAL 317 GAMEFRAME! NOT A 474+ ETC!!!
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/21md7aa.jpg[/img]
Almost Full Relleka Spawns!!!
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/14l2ago.jpg[/img]
Full Tzhaar City!!! Just need to work on NPC emotes
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ijjngg.jpg[/img]
Ice Queen!
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/svrlup.jpg[/img]
Avatar Boss!
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2z5uanl.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/1zlssv4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rqccgh.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/hte4yh.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/5vun4k.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/14y8shw.jpg[/img]
[URL=http://uppit.com/v/3fg1uf1h]Download Client[/URL]
[URL=http://uppit.com/v/4QWDQRZV]Download Server [/URL]
Credits~
Pk3r John - Client, I lost mine Killamess - Base Bakatool - Base Thing1 - Helping me PETR - Me, for doing some work on it

item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“kambo77, post:25, topic:320122”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=416579.msg3063421#msg3063421 date=1261017597]

it looks very basic and classic but i like it and i think you did a good job:)

SOURCE IS VERY VERY BASIC NOT MANY GOOD ITEMS, ALMOST RS LIKE, AND IF YOU’D LIKE RS SERVER’S, ID ADVISE YOU TO GO PLAY RS.

basic? ur gay

It is basic though; at least what you added is. I’ve seen this on R-S. Did you post it there or did you just take someone’s source and call it your own?

oh ya i just leeched this of course… i posted this on google because i got mooted here

Alright, it’s you. But if you think MoparScape is gay, please leave right now.

@source: Not that good. Few edits, NPC spawns, etc.
[/quote][/quote]

Wow you’re cool because you can quote… Like you can make any better dumbshit[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2009, 05:59:19 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Lewis), post:19, topic:320122”]I’m going to add re-coloured items, d claws, cardbaord cut out customs to this server and release as my own, thanks.

Jokes :P, good work looks good i like the bosses, atleast you didn’t use the ones everyone else did, little plain though(from what i can see from the pictures, anyway), but isn’t devo 2.7 quite un stable?[/quote]

i guess i got bored of this so i stopped because i want to maek a pk serbar
